Posted By: Sabisent (7/3/2013 7:56:56 AM)

posts.post_content:
Combine [Trojstani's Summoner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Trojstani's Summoner) with [Parallel Lives](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Parallel Lives) - gain double the fun... and it does not end here. Combine the previous card combo with [Progenitor Mimic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Progenitor Mimic) and let the token festival start ;D Now you all might say: " what about board whipe?" - my answer to that is our best friend [Rootborn Defenses](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rootborn Defenses) I have never felt more satisfaction compared to when a friend of mine tried to whipe the board and I dropped this baby of a card.. say hello to my army of rhinos, centaurs and knights.. ohh and thank you pal for clearing out the board for me! :D gg wp.  
  
As a bonus info.. this deck would play as G, W, U so ramping up to seven mana should be relatively easy in a casual multiplayer deck.. In standard the combo would work yet getting to the point with it actually start to kick in might be impossible against aggressive decks unless one builds heavy around early defense. Have fun everyone!
posts.html:

As a bonus info.. this deck would play as G, W, U so ramping up to seven mana should be relatively easy in a casual multiplayer deck..
